abstract: Warren E. Buffett sold about HK$1.1 billion worth ($141 million) of shares in PetroChina, his second sale in two months, amid calls for United States investors to reduce holdings in China’s biggest oil producer because of its links to Sudan.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett sold about HK$1.1 billion worth ($141 million) of shares in PetroChina, his second sale in two months, amid calls for United States investors to reduce holdings in China’s biggest oil producer because of its links to Sudan.

headline.main: Buffett Sells PetroChina Shares Amid Calls to Cut Ties With Sudan
